title: Ford's third-quarter China vehicle sales down 30.3% year-on-year to 131,060
text:
Ford's third-quarter China vehicle sales down 30.3% year-on-year to 131,060

Stock Markets 36 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 03:43AM ET)

© Reuters. FILE PHOTO: Chinese national flag flies on the roof of a Ford car dealership in Beijing BEIJING (Reuters) - Ford Motor Co's (N: ) July-to-September vehicle sales in China fell 30%, as the U.S. automaker continues to lose ground in a prolonged sales decline in its second biggest market. The Dearborn, Michigan-based automaker's delivered 131,060 vehicles in China in the third quarter, Ford said in a statement. Ford's sales in China fell 35.8% in the first quarter and by 21.7% in the second quarter. It delivered around 421,000 vehicles in the first nine months of the year, according to Reuters calculations.

Ford's third-quarter China vehicle sales down 30.3% year-on-year to 131,060
description: Ford's third-quarter China vehicle sales down 30.3% year-on-year to 131,060
